mapper.select: SELECT * FROM category_attribute CA JOIN CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE CAV ON CA.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_IDX = CAV.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_IDX WHERE CA.CATEGORY_IDX = #{category}

SELECT P.PRODUCT_IDX, P.PRODUCT_NAME, TO_CHAR(P.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION) PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION , P.PRICE, P.CATEGORY_IDX, P.CREATED_AT, P.UPDATED_AT, PA.PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE_IDX, PA.PRODUCT_IDX, PA.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_IDX, PA.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_IDX, PA.CUSTOM_VALUE, CAV.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_IDX, CAV.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_IDX, CAV.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_NAME, PI.PRODUCT_IMAGE_IDX, PI.PRODUCT_IMAGE_NAME, PI.PRODUCT_IMAGE_EXT, PI.PRODUCT_SFILE_NAME FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE PA ON P.PRODUCT_IDX = PA.PRODUCT_IDX LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE CAV ON PA.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_IDX = CAV.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_IDX LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE PI ON P.PRODUCT_IDX = PI.PRODUCT_IDX WHERE P.CATEGORY_IDX = #{category}
SELECT * FROM CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE CA JOIN CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE CAV ON CA.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_IDX = CAV.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_IDX WHERE CA.CATEGORY_IDX = #{category}
